Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPLEFT", 0, 0) GameTooltip:AddLine('TALC', 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:AddLine('Left-click to toggle frame') GameTooltip:AddLine('Right-click for options') GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if arg1 == "LeftButton" then VoteFrame:ToggleMainWindow_OnClick() else VoteFrame:ShowMinimapDropdown() end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Auto Promote Officers to Assistant') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Enable Best In Slot (BIS) pick option on loot.') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Enable Main Spec (MS) pick option on loot.') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Enable Off Spec (OS) pick option on loot.') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Enable Transmog (XMOG) pick option on loot.') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Take a screenshot whenever loot is awarded.') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Play a sound when looting an item.') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Set the sound volume to High') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Win Frame will pop up when looting Uncommon quality items.') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Win Frame will pop up when looting Rare quality items.') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Win Frame will pop up when looting Epic quality items.') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Win Frame will pop up when looting Legendary quality items.') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Play a sound when requested to roll on an item.') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Set the sound volume to High.') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Play a sad trombone sound when losing a roll.') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Collapse loot frames after picking.') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Enable boss defeated toast.') GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Enable boss loot toast.') GameTooltip:Show()
